column1: $Libromancer Geek Boy$Unlimited$WIND$[Psychic/Effect]$$$$$3$800$800$$$$You can reveal 1 Ritual Monster in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Libromancer" Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Libromancer Geek Boy" once per turn.$Supports archetypes /Libromancer$$Reveals cards in your hand/Activates upon Special Summon/Adds from Deck to hand$$
